summary.problem: TradeFlow Excel Add-in was missing data for certain origins (e.g., USA for soft wheat) and showed discrepancies in data values compared to the TradeMatrix dashboard.
summary.solution: The issue was caused by a bug in the TradeFlow Excel Add-in. The bug has been fixed in a new version of the add-in. Users experiencing missing data or discrepancies should update to the corrected version of the Excel Add-in. Installation of the fixed version can be done via a support-guided Teams call to ensure proper setup. After updating, users should refresh their data to see the corrected and complete dataset, including all origins such as the USA.
